name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stylo: Custom Color & Font for Google and GPT

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Design your Google & GPT UI with your favourite colors and fonts, in both Light and Dark mode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Design and style your Google and GPT UI on your will.

Choose from expert picked color combinations or let your color mind flow.

Available for both Light and Dark mode.

Just colors? Nada!! Choose from different fonts and apply to your UI.

More preset views coming soon!!
